import React ,{useState}from 'react' import './EmployeeAdd.css' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' function EmployeeAdd() { const [profilepicture, setProfilepicture] = useState(false) const [application, setApplication] = useState(false) const [passport, setPassport] = useState(false) const [data,setData] = useState({ name:"", age:"", birthday:"", email:"", address:"", phonenumber:"", passport:"", citizen:"", religion:"", qualification:"" }) const handleSubmit = async (e)=>{ const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.value setData((data)=>({...data,[name]:value})) console.log(data) } return (
